snippet.title: ExtraGalactica E3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Platformer preview: Gameplay reveal trailer (E3 2021).

Check out ExtraGalactica Infinite Mode Steam Early Access! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1207840/ExtraGalactica/

Your support during this time helps us continue to develop the project!


Music by: Scandroid featuring Dance with the Dead
Song Title: Neo Tokyo (Dance with the Dead Remix)
https://scandroid.bandcamp.com/album/scandroid
https://dancewiththedead.bandcamp.com/
https://www.fixtonline.com/

Developer: Digital Yogurt 
Developer/Publisher: Ghost Street Games

If you would like to learn more about the origins of ExtraGalactica click here and be sure to read the description: https://youtu.be/JrWZOjUrKpM

Trailer by: Matt Lewis 2021
